metadata.title: CVE-2022-3030 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An improper access control issue in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting before 15.1.6, all versions from 15.2 before 15.2.4, all versionsfrom 15.3 before 15.3.2 allows disclosure of pipeline status tounauthorized users.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
